name: Gatsby inspired glass baubles
description:
We've added to our range of 100% recycled glass tree decorations this year after the overwhelming demand of previous years. These stunning Gatsby inspired shell baubles, packed in sets of 4, are the ultimate luxury. Each bauble has a rustic metal hoop and recycled sari tie and the sets are presented in a pretty cotton gift bag. Average size 9 cm (d).

Recycled & Fairtrade

name: Recycled glass baubles set of 12 - BESTSELLER
description:
These exquisite clear and silver 100% recycled glass decorations look gorgeous on and off the tree, they catch and reflect the light creating a soft twinkling effect. Packed in sets of 12, making an ideal gift, each bauble has a rustic metal hoop and recycled sari tie & baubles come in an assortment of shapes and sizes. Recycling glass not only saves energy (50% less energy that that required to make new glass) but is an on-going process, as glass can be recycled continually. This means we can create new beautiful and useful objects with less impact on our environment. Average size 3cm (d). 

Recycled & Fairtrade

name: Chalk board storage jar
description:
Update your kitchen with these vintage style storage jars. Each has a little chalk board label. practical storage solutions made using recycled glass and with an air-tight screw top lid. Size;18.5 x 10 x 10cm and 21 x 10 x 10cm

Recycled

name: Colourful recycled glass baubles set of 12
description:
We've added to our range of 100% recycled glass tree decorations this year after the overwhelming demand of previous years. Packed in sets of 12, making an ideal gift, each bauble has a rustic metal hoop and recycled sari tie & baubles come in an assortment of shapes and sizes in a pretty cotton gift bag. Average size 3cm (d).

Recycled & Fairtrade

name: Ruth Cross hot water bottle cover
description:
Greenstead has teamed up with British knitwear designer Ruth Cross to add a touch of glamour to the traditional knitted hot water bottle cover. This one is hand knitted in Sailsbury and combines the softest British lambswool with a hint of sparkling silver thread and a drawstring satin ribbon opening. The perfect gift for a deserving friend or a little bit of luxury for yourself. Bottle not included.

British made

name: Split-glaze stoneware napkin ring set of four
description:
We're really pleased with our range of hand-thrown stoneware, made in Scotland by a local potter in the Greenstead area. The collection is very on trend with it's gentle grey hue, split-glaze and chunky detail.  It's been reduction fired and finished with a foodsafe oatmeal overlay. The whole range is dishwasher safe and these rustic napkin rings double up as egg cups. 5cm (h) x 4cm (diameter).

British made

name: Rustic colourful baubles (set of 8)
description:
This collection of rustic baubles comes in an assortment of eight rich colours including gold, orange, green, purple, blue, red, silver and clear crackle. The babubles are made using recycled glass and sari fabric ties and are fairly traded. 5cm diameter each.

Fairtrade and Recycled

name: Long handled wooden salad servers - BESTSELLER
description:
These attractive salad servers, featured in the October issue of Homes & Gardens magazine, have been hand carved from mango wood. The finish is smooth and the natural grain of the wood really shines through. The long handled set are a real style statement and look partciularly good with a large salad bowl, we've teamed ours up with our mango wood platter. 46cm (l).

Fairtrade

name: Carved wooden dove doorstop - BESTSELLER
description:
These cheerful hand carved wooden door stops offer a delightful solution to awkward doors with so much more charm than the usual rubber or bulky doorstops. Also perfect for a gift, the mango wood used is sustainable and FSC certified. Size: 19 cm x 7 cm.

Fairtrade and Sustainable

name: Woven small basket grey natural stripe
description:
Our beautiful woven jute baskets combine traditional artisanal skills with contemporary design.  Hand-made in Bangladesh these fairtrade baskets have given entire villages the opportunity to earn a fair and sustainable living. This basket is the perfect size for packing away on-going crafts, toys or fire logs and the handles make it easy to lift. Everything at Greenstead is tried and tested and the basket Isobel uses has been going strong for four years and still looks good as new. 40cm (h) x 30cm (w). Sizes and colour shades may vary.

Fairtrade

name: Ruth Cross cosy lambswool socks
description:
Greenstead has teamed up with British knitwear designer Ruth Cross to bring you these wonderfully cosy hand-knitted socks. Perfect for lounging around these soft lambswool socks with sparkling detail around the anckle are exclusive to Greenstead. The perfect gift for the friend with everything or a little bit of luxury for yourself. Available in Almond or Slate. One size, fitting 4-7.

British made

name: Reclaimed wooden frame small
description:
These charming rustic frames are amongst our bestsellers as they make lovely gifts or look stunning when you pull a few together in different shades and sizes for a feature wall. Each frame is hand-made from reclaimed timber and no two are exactly the same. They come from an organisation who works with the homeless in Cape Town offering them an opportunity to get back into work and off the streets. Available in white, grey and taupe in three great sizes. To be hung on a wall, not freestanding. 23cm x 23cm with 10cm x 10cm window. Sizes and colours will vary slightly.

Fairtrade & Recycled

name: Vintage daisy cushion cover
description:
Our vintage selection of limited edition cushion covers have been a massive success so we've done some more. This glorious daisy contrast fabric is typical of the 50's. We've teamed the soft vintage cotton with elegant gold linen piped edging and envelope opening  to the back. Size 40 x 40 cm. Will fit our standard 16" feather cushion pad. Limited stock available, get in quick if you like these.

British made, Italian linen, Vintage cotton

name: Split-glaze stoneware preserve pot
description:
We're really pleased with our range of rustic stoneware, hand-made in Scotland by a local potter in the Greenstead area. The collection is very on trend with it's gentle grey hue, split-glaze and chunky detail.  It's been reduction fired and finished with a foodsafe oatmeal overlay. The whole range is dishwasher safe. This is amongst our bestsellers as it makes a great gift and has multiple uses. 10.5cm (h) x 7cm (w), including lid.

British made

name: Knitted Ruth Cross cushion
description:
Greenstead has teamed up with British knitwear designer Ruth Cross to bring you the softest lambswool cushion to cosy up to this winter. Hand knitted here in the UK, we've added a touch of sparkle to this traditional almond knit and a delicate silver thread runs throughout.  Complete with feather cushion pad. 
Size approx 25 x 38 cm.

British made

name: Carved wooden candlestick
description:
These elegant candlesticks look great either side of a mantel or on the hearth and are carved from sustainable mango wood, the curved centre painted in a soft cream. Mango wood is an eco-friendly material. Mango trees eventually stop bearing fruit and as the old trees are cleared to make way for new plantations the wood can be put to good use elsewhere, offering another source of income to the farmers. Height 20cm, candle diameter 8cm.

Fairtrade

name: Ceramic bird bottle stopper - BESTSELLER
description:
These delightful ceramic bottle stoppers are an elegant way to preserve oils and vinegars or perhaps some homemade elderflower cordial. A lovely little trinket for the girl who has everything or a perfect gift to accompany a bottle of wine when you head over to a friends house for dinner. 9cm (h).

Fairtrade

More due in stock at the end of October.

name: Tall hand-turned table lamp
description:
This elegant table lamp is exclusive to Greenstead and is the result of our collaboration with British designer and carpenter George Johnson. The base is solid ash and has been hand-turned by George in his Kent workshop. The off-white paint is carefully spray applied so as not to mask the natural wood grains. These lamps are made-to-order and delivery is 2-3 weeks. If you have any specific requirements just let us know and we'll see what we can do. Solid wood, wired-up and ready to go. 46cm (h) x 26cm (w). Shades sold separately.

British made

name: Bespoke lamps service
description:
We are now able to offer a bespoke lamps service to cater for your own size requirements. Again we use solid ash and lamps made to your own specifications are lovingly hand-turned by George in his Kent workshop. The off-white paint is carefully spray applied so as not to mask the natural wood grains. Please see the options below and note that we work to the same time frame of 2-3 weeks and bespoke purchases are non-refundable. Shades sold separately.

To order please select either small (up to 40cm tall) or large (40-60cm tall) and we will be in touch within 24 hours for your specific measurements and to see which of our two designs you would like us to work to. Thank you. 

*PROMOTIONAL DISCOUNTS NOT VALID ON BESPOKE SERVICES.*

name: Vintage style recycled glass tealight  - BESTSELLER
description:
Available in a set of three (save £2) or single

These beautiful antiqued silver tealights are made using 100% recycled glass. The perfect Christmas gift or winter house warming present, light a couple on the mantle or mix and match with other styles to create an eclectic look. The rustic silver finish catches the candle light and exudes gentle flickers of light. Recycling glass not only saves energy (50% less energy that that required to make new glass) but is an on-going process which means we can create new beautiful and useful objects with less impact on our environment. 7cm (h).

Recycled

name: Hand painted ceramic coat hook
description:
These gorgeous ceramic hooks look fantastic either on their own or all in a row, and they add a bit of life to your everyday clothes hook. 16cm (l).

Fair-trade

More due in stock at the end of October.

name: Split-glaze stoneware jug
description:
We're really pleased with our new range of rustic stoneware, hand-made in Scotland by a local potter in the Greenstead area. The collection is very on trend with it's gentle grey hue, split-glaze and chunky detail.  It's been reduction fired and finished with a foodsafe oatmeal overlay. The whole range is dishwasher safe. 8cm (h) x 7cm (w).

British made

name: Woven table-cloth with sparkling thread
description:
This elegant woven table-covering is perfect for adding a touch of glamour to your dinner-table this winter. Try combining with some of our pretty glass tealights for the ultimate dining experience. Luxuriously soft and delicately hand-woven with sparkling silver thread and fringed edge. Fold and use as a table-runner or simply use full width. 100% cotton. Hand wash recommended. 80cm (w) x 180cm (l)

Fairtrade

name: Dappled recycled glass tealight - BESTSELLER
description:
These beautiful dappled tealights are finished in rustic silver and hand made using 100% recycled glass. Scatter over your mantle piece or table for an elegant dinner-party and partner with one of our sparkling thread table-coverings. Recycling glass not only saves energy (50% less energy that that required to make new glass) but is an on-going process, as glass can be recycled continually. This means we can create new beautiful and useful objects with less impact on our environment. 8cm (w) x 4cm (h).

Recycled

name: Vintage rose cushion cover
description:
Our vintage selection of limited edition cushion covers have been a massive success so we've done some more. This glorious blooming rose fabric is typical of the 50's. We've teamed the soft vintage cotton with elegant gold linen piped edging and envelope opening to the back. Size 40 x 40 cm. Will fit our standard 16" feather cushion pad. Limited stock available, get in quick if you like these.

British made, Italian linen

name: Antique linen tea-towel blue or red stripe
description:
Originally used for French grain sacks these durable antique linen tea-towels have a second use and can be doubled up to be used as pot holders. They often feature handstitched monograms. Machine wash at 60 degrees and tumble try if desired. Size (approx) -  80cm (l) x 46cm (w).

Hand finished in Britain

name: Floating recycled glass tealights set of 3
description:
As well as being free-standing tealights these pretty glass trinkets also float making them the perfect centre piece for the festive season.  The combination of the twinkling flame againts the rustic silver finish, and the reflection on the water creates a really beautiful effect. 100% recycled. Recycling glass not only saves energy (50% less energy that that required to make new glass) but is an on-going process, as glass can be recycled continually. This means we can create new beautiful and useful objects with less impact on our environment. 5cm (d).

Recycled

name: Woven tall basket natural
description:
Our beautiful woven jute baskets combine traditional artisanal skills with contemporary design.  Hand-made in Bangladesh these fair-trade baskets have given entire villages the opportunity to earn a fair and sustainable living. The tall basket is the perfect size for laundry and the handles make it easy to lift along to your washing machine. Everything at Greenstead is tried and tested and the basket Isobel uses has been going strong for four years and still looks good as new. 50cm (h) x 40cm (w). Sizes and colour shades may vary.

Fairtrade

name: Large handled cotton tote - 50% 0FF
description:
These screen-printed cotton bags are wondefully roomy and expand easily to cater for everything from groceries to gym kit and trainers. and They also double-up as a handy laundry bag, easy to carry down to the washing machine and an attractive storage solution. Hand-made from cotton with an extra large cane ring handle they are a real style statement. 80 x 55 x 10cm (approx)

Fair-trade

WAS £16.95  NOW £8.50

name: Antique linen cushion cover 45 x 45 cm
description:
Greenstead has teamed up with talented British seamstress Lorraine Weir to create these beautiful cushion covers. The characterful linen was originally used for French grain sacks and has been lovingly made-up into chic cushions with envelope backs, the original hand-sewn seams preserved as much as possible.  Machine wash at 60 degrees and tumble try if desired. Size (approx) -  45 x 45 cm and will fit  our standard 18" x 18" feather cushion pads.

British made

name: Reclaimed wooden frame large
description:
These charming rustic frames are amongst our bestsellers as they make lovely gifts or look stunning when you pull a few together in different shades and sizes for a feature wall. Each frame is hand-made from reclaimed timber and no two are exactly the same. They come from an organisation who works with the homeless in Cape Town offering them an opportunity to get back into work and off the streets. Available in white, taupe, grey or cream and in three great sizes. To be hung on a wall, not freestanding. 34cm x 43cm with 21cm x 29.5cm window. Sizes and colours will vary slightly. 

Fairtrade

name: Hand-turned table lamp
description:
The smaller alternative to our tall lamp, this is the perfect size for bedside tables, mantles and shelves and it has a lovely country cottage feel to it. Exclusive to Greenstead and the result of our collaboration with British designer and carpenter George Johnson, the base is solid ash and has been hand-turned. The off-white paint is carefully spray applied so as not to mask the natural wood grains. Made-to-order and delivery is 2-3 weeks. If you have any specific requirements just let us know and we'll see what we can do. Solid wood, wired-up and ready to go. 30cm (h). Shades sold separately.

British made

name: Antique linen cushion cover 33 x 43 cm
description:
Greenstead has teamed up with talented British seamstress Lorraine Weir to create these beautiful cushion covers. The characterful linen was originally used for French grain sacks and has been lovingly made-up into chic cushions with envelope backs, the original hand-sewn seams and monograms preserved as much as possible. Machine wash at 60 degrees and tumble try if desired. Size (approx) -  33 x 43 cm and will fit  our standard 13" x 17" feather cushion pads.

British made

name: Wooden chopping board small
description:
These beautiful wooden chopping boards are made from sustainable mango wood and come with a leather tie, perfect for hanging them up and out of the way. This small size is ideal for chopping herbs, serving cheese and slicing that all important lime for your gin and tonic. Mango wood is an eco-friendly material. The trees stop bearing fruit when they reach a certain age and size. As the old trees are cleared to make way for new plantations the wood can be put to good use elsewhere, offering another source of income to the farmers. 32cm (l) x 16cm (w).

Sustainable

name: Split-glaze stoneware spaghetti jar
description:
We're really pleased with our new range of rustic stoneware, hand-made in Scotland by a local potter in the Greenstead area. The collection is very on trend with it's gentle grey hue, split-glaze and chunky detail.  It's been reduction fired and finished with a foodsafe oatmeal overlay. This useful jar is ideal for storing dried spaghetti and linguine. The whole range is dishwasher safe. 

British made

name: Carved wooden bowl and platter
description:
These beautiful wooden bowls are hand made from sustainable mango wood.  Ideal for salads, cheese, and serving condiments and sauces at the table. Choose either the bowl or the platter as the perfect accompaniment to our wooden salad servers. Bowl 36cm (length incl handles) x 9cm (h) Platter 48cm (l) x 24cm (w) x 5cm (h); £35 each.

To preserve the wood we advise that you wash these items in warm soapy water and dry immediately. Do not leave submerged in water as this may stain the wood.

Sustainable

name: Turkish hand towel eucalyptus or taupe
description:
These stylish hand-woven tassled linens are the ultimate accessory for summer living as they have so many uses. Traditionally used for hand-towels in Turkey, they also make fantastic table-coverings or could be used for picnics, as beach towels or even serongs. Available in two subtle colour ways. 100cm (w) x170cm (l).

Fair-trade

name: Split-glaze stoneware pot - 50% OFF
description:
We're really pleased with our new range of rustic stoneware, hand-made in Scotland by a local potter in the Greenstead area. The collection is very on trend with it's gentle grey hue, split-glaze and chunky detail. This piece is very versatile and can be used to serve oils and vinegars at the table to prevent dripping, sits perfectly alongside the soap dish to house dish and bottle brushes and also works well as a vase. It's been reduction fired and finished with a foodsafe oatmeal overlay. The whole range is dishwasher safe. 

British made

WAS £14.95   NOW £7.50

name: Woven throw
description:
We love this attractive diamond weave throw with fringe edging made from a luxuriously soft cotton. It's always nice to have a blanket on your sofa to wrap around your shoulders on colder evenings or cover a seat that's in need of a little tlc. Handwoven in Turkey using age - old techniques and traditional hand looms. 100% cotton. 140cm (w) x 200cm (l).

Fairtrade

More stock due early October

name: Antique linen cushion cover 40 x 40 cm
description:
Greenstead has teamed up with talented British seamstress Lorraine Weir to create these beautiful cushion covers. The characterful linen was originally used for French grain sacks and has been lovingly made-up into chic cushions with envelope backs, the original hand-sewn seams preserved as much as possible.  Machine wash at 60 degrees and tumble try if desired. Size (approx) -  40 x 40 cm and will fit  our standard 16" x 16" feather cushion pads.

British made

Sorry this item is currently out of stock but we expect more in September. Please email customerservices@greensteadboutique for a specific delivery due date.

name: Carved wooden symbol
description:
This stylish wooden symbol is handmade from sustainable mango wood. Mango trees are initially grown for their fruit but once the trees reach a certain size and age, they stop bearing fruit and at this stage can be cut down and used to create wooden products. The removal of the old trees makes space for farmers to plant new mango trees and this not only means that none of the wood is wasted but offers a supplementary income to mango wood farmers. Each letter is free standing but included in the box is a wall hanging fixture should you wish to hang them. Size approx: 25cm (h)

Sustainable

name: Split-glaze stoneware soap dish
description:
We're really pleased with our range of rustic stoneware, hand-made in Scotland by a local potter in the Greenstead area. The collection is very on trend with it's gentle grey hue, split-glaze and chunky detail.  It's been reduction fired and finished with a foodsafe oatmeal overlay. 11cm (l) x 8.5cm (w).

British made

name: Wooden chopping board large
description:
These beautiful wooden chopping boards are made from sustainable mango wood and come with a leather tie, perfect for hanging them up and out of the way. Mango wood is an eco-friendly material. The trees stop bearing fruit when they reach a certain age and size. As the old trees are cleared to make way for new plantations the wood can be put to good use elsewhere, offering another source of income to the farmers. 49cm (l) x 31cm (w).

Sustainable

name: Reclaimed wooden frame medium

These charming rustic frames are amongst our bestsellers as they make lovely gifts or look stunning when you pull a few together in different shades and sizes for a feature wall. Each frame is hand-made from reclaimed timber and no two are exactly the same. They come from an organisation who works with the homeless in Cape Town offering them an opportunity to get back into work and off the streets. Available in white, grey, taupe and cream in three great sizes. To be hung on a wall, not freestanding. 23cm x 29cm with 10cm x 15cm window. Sizes and colours will vary slightly.

name: Woven storage basket grey
description:
Our beautiful woven jute baskets combine traditional artisanal skills with contemporary design.  Hand-made in Bangladesh these fair-trade baskets have given entire villages the opportunity to earn a fair and sustainable living. The low basket is the perfect size for magazines or folded bed linen and the handles make it easy to lift. Everything at Greenstead is tried and tested and the basket Isobel uses has been going strong for four years and still looks good as new. 28cm (h) x 45cm (w) x 32cm (d). Sizes and colour shades may vary.

Fairtrade

name: Range towel - blue stripe
description:
The perfect partner to an Aga or Rayburn oven, these range towels are amongst our bestsellers. A popper fastening prevents the towel from falling on the floor, it will hang until you're ready for it, drying quickly after use. Longlasting quality gauranteed. 75% cotton, 25% linen. Available in four colour-ways. Machine washable.

British made

name: Wooden salad servers
description:
These attractive salad servers have been hand carved from mango wood. The finish is smooth and the natural grain of the wood really shines through. Mango wood is an eco-friendly material. The trees stop bearing fruit when they reach a certain age and size. As the old trees are cleared to make way for new plantations the wood can be put to good use elsewhere, offering another source of income to the farmers. 30cm (l).

Fair-trade

More stock due early November

name: Split-glaze stoneware utensil holder
description:
We're really pleased with our new range of rustic stoneware, hand-made in Scotland by a local potter in the Greenstead area. The collection is very on trend with it's gentle grey hue, split-glaze and chunky detail.  It's been reduction fired and finished with a foodsafe oatmeal overlay. This charming utensil holder can also be used as a vase or to present wine at the table. The whole range is dishwasher safe. 17.5cm (h) x 12cm (w).

British made

name: Feather cushion insert 33cm x 43cm
description:
Duck feather cushion pad. 

Cushion pads will arrive with some air compressed for postal purposes. Plump your cushion pads before you insert them and regularly thereafter.

Available for Greenstead customers convenience and are only sold alongside cushion cover purchases, not sold separately.

Care instructions; professional dry cleaning, hand wash or use a laundrette size ( large capacity) machine at 40C using a wool cycle, promptly spin dry and then hot air tumble dry. Always ensure that the filling is thoroughly dried. Do not iron.

name: Vintage enamel bread bin
description:
We have sourced a selection of these wonderful vintage enamel bread bins with embossed lettering and edging, dating to around 1920-30. Sizes and colours will very slightly and the slight rusting and rustic condition is all part of the charm and a result of the age of these finds. Approx size - 32cm (h) x 34cm (w) x 25cm (d) 

Vintage

New stock will be available from February - please contact us for more info.

name: Feather cushion insert 16 inches
description:
Duck feather cushion pad. 

Cushion pads will arrive with some air compressed for postal purposes. Plump your cushion pads before you insert them and regularly thereafter.

Care instructions; professional dry cleaning, hand wash or use a laundrette size ( large capacity) machine at 40C using a wool cycle, promptly spin dry and then hot air tumble dry. Always ensure that the filling is thoroughly dried. Do not iron.

name: Feather cushion insert 18 inches
description:
Duck feather cushion pad. 

Cushion pads will arrive with some air compressed for postal purposes. Plump your cushion pads before you insert them and regularly thereafter.

name: Antique wire egg basket
description:
A lovely antique basket, probably French and pre 1940s. Traditionally used to collect eggs from the garden, it would then be hung up in a cool larder to keep the eggs fresh. Size - 30cm (h) x 24cm (w). 

Antique item

name: Antique utensil holder
description:
Originally used as storage jars and fitted with cork lids, these antique stoneware containers now make fantastic utensil holders. Sturdy, useful and will add character to any kitchen. Made in England. Sizes and glaze colours may vary. Size (approx) 17cm (w) x 20cm (h)

Antique

More on their way soon, please email us for a specific delivery date.

name: Vintage Sanderson cushion cover
description:
This stunning cushion has been made up from the classic Sanderson vintage fabric known as Hydrangea. Soft cotton printed fabric to the front and linen to the back with a envelope opening and piped edges. 42 x 42 cm. Will fit our standard 18" feather cushion pad.

British made

Sorry this item is sold out. If you are looking for vintage cushions like this just email us and we'll see if we can source some more.
